posts.post_content:
I would like to add a few more T206 Broadleafs to my collection, so if anyone is quietly considering selling or trading, please let me know.  Perhaps the timing works for you for some trading or some denero.

Like most of us I prefer to have a clean back, regardless of grade.

My "pipe dream" is to get a Rucker Throwing BL460 in case anyone knows where to source that one.

I can offer a lot of rare backs, scrap and other fun cards to trade, so feel free to pm me.

Thanks in advance!

Michael :cool:

over ratted back imho.....

B.L. should go $600.00 that grade....yours prob go $1200.00 in this market FRANK... :)
